TopicTitle: (bot test) SASed Warp [v2.2.2 for KSP2 v0.2.1]

Articles.Content:
Latest mod template has a workflow step that uploads changelog as a forum post.
But it was failing time to time. I need this topic to quickly iterate on the workflow. If it's possible, I'd like to delete this topic later.
